summary: An email from attorney Thomas Moyer at Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP to the SDNY, transmitting an additional production of documents from Deutsche Bank in response to a July 11, 2019 subpoena. The email includes a cover letter and a password-protected zip file attachment.

persons.name: Thomas Moyer
persons.context: Attorney at Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP who sent the email transmitting Deutsche Bank's document production to the SDNY in response to a subpoena.

connections.description: Thomas Moyer is acting as legal counsel, transmitting document productions on behalf of Deutsche Bank to the SDNY.

events.title: SDNY Subpoena to Deutsche Bank
events.description: The SDNY issued a subpoena to Deutsche Bank, likely as part of the Epstein investigation, requesting documents.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Document Production
events.description: Deutsche Bank, through its attorney Thomas Moyer, submitted an additional production of documents to the SDNY in response to the July 11 subpoena.

locations: 2001 K Street N.W., Washington, DC 20006 (Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP office)
keyFacts: Deutsche Bank was subpoenaed by the SDNY on July 11, 2019, as part of the Epstein investigation.
Attorney Thomas Moyer of Akin Gump transmitted an additional document production from Deutsche Bank to the SDNY on July 30, 2019.
The document production was password-protected and delivered via a secure file-sharing system (Citrix Files).
This correspondence demonstrates ongoing legal compliance and evidence gathering by financial institutions connected to Epstein.
